website_summaries.verdict: Top-selling gummies that taste great and also contain bee pollen, echinacea, zinc, and vitamin C.
pros: Made from elderberry extract that's strong and pure
Gummies are vegan and are naturally sweetened
Pack of two equals a 60-day supply
cons: Some reports of inconsistencies of the ingredients based on information on the labels

customer_reviews.title: The price is going up daily due to a crisis $28.00 , $34.00, $37.00 all in 3 days
customer_reviews.text: I like and needed the product. So I told a friend. I order mines the price was $28.00 ant two days later it was $34.00. So I wanted some for my daughter and a day later $37.00. Please stop taking advantage of people during a time of crises.
customer_reviews.author: Danita Jo McKinley

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I won’t get into “does elderberry work or not” I believe they do so I buy them. I have a 1st Grader and a 2 year old that haven’t spent more than 2 days in a row slightly sick in a year so... I bought these specifically because of the price vs the quantity and that they are 1 gummy per dose. It’s not a good value when you buy a bottle of 60, but have to take 2 per dose, etc. I was pleasantly surprised that they are very squishy and taste very good!
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: Not vegan
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as vegan but the bottles say gelatin. Glad I read the ingredients before taking them!
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: YESSSSS
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the flavor of these gummies! I hate that they only suggest up to two a day. I want to eat the whole bottle in one sitting. But I was sick last week and made sure to take two each day. The cold only lasted 3 days, and I really feel that these helped to nip it in the bud a bit quicker. I am also taking every day for preventative care. Will be buying once I finish the two bottles I currently have.
customer_reviews.author: C. Rivera

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I am starting to swear by these elderberry gummies! I got them to help my family get through the flu/cold season, we have 2 small children and our house can get sick a lot! I've been taking them religiously, and I have been around a lot of sick people and haven't caught anything yet! I've been giving them to my kids as well, and they think they're delicious. They actually ask me to take them daily! Will be ordering again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Elderberry product we've tried!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old daughter, my husband and myself all use this product daily throughout the colder months and anytime we feel the slightest bit of something coming on. We are happy with the quality and strength of ingredients compared to others we have tried previously. Especially love that there are no sugars!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and easy on stomach
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting gummy. Not sure why but some of the other gummies have bothered my stomach. These were fresh as you can tell from the texture of the gummies. Had a cold for few days and wanted to try these. Overnight I feel less congested as everything is starting to come up. Will continue to take as a supplement throughout winter. Great all in one gummy bear o boost your immune system and be ready for the winter colds.
customer_reviews.author: P. Wong

customer_reviews.title: They taste terrific and work terrific
customer_reviews.text: I love love love these elderberry gummy’s because they have no sugar they taste amazing and I use them for anti-immunity properties due to the fact that I’m a hairdresser and I deal with a lot of people and they come in sick sometimes and I use them to ward off sickness is they are amazing
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly L. Pirro

customer_reviews.title: What's really in the bottle?
customer_reviews.text: Product is not organic. The description claims that it is organic but not found on label of product. Attempted to research and found no website ,product info or evidence of existence except the product sold on Amazon. I dont feel safe giving this to my children
customer_reviews.author: Shopping addict

customer_reviews.title: Yummy & Effective
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I've ordered these -- the price is right, and the quality of the product is great! They cost about the same as the generic brand in the store (if you can actually ever find them; my store is always sold out), and you take just one of them, vs. two of most of the other brands, so these are a better value. And I don't want to jinx anything, but let's just say that everyone else around me is sick with something or another right now ... and here, so far, so good. I will be ordering again when my stock gets low.
customer_reviews.author: big mama

customer_reviews.title: Taste great
customer_reviews.text: These are super yummy. I work in an elementary school so I wanted to boost my immune system. So far I haven’t been sick!
customer_reviews.author: Jspain

customer_reviews.title: Totally rely on these
customer_reviews.text: I had to give one star for "easy to swallow" as you dont swallow this like a pill but instead you chew it up like a gummy bear. Its a little more chewy i think than a true piece of candy but its way more fun than swallowing yet another pill. Helps my immune system greatly as im always in the hospital and theyre always giving me tons of antibiotics. So i have this right on my kitchen table and take it within 15 mins of arriving home from hospital. It, along with probiotics and addition vit c and zince tablets are my fail safe actions to return me to proper health after the doctors have had their fun.
customer_reviews.author: bonemama55

customer_reviews.title: Tasty Juju
customer_reviews.text: I’d say a gummy a day keeps the virus away, but we all know that’s not true. But if you subscribe to the Elderberry Juju, which I guess I do since I haven’t so much as had a sniffle since I started taking the supplement almost a year ago now, these are a tasty little the imbibe in the juju. Keep them out of reach of children though. They are good enough that the entire bottle could disappear. Is it possible to OD on Elderberry?
customer_reviews.author: K. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Excellent flavor, great for a maintenance dose
customer_reviews.text: My family are long time users of elderberry syrup and have great success with it staying flu free for the past several years. I purchased these gummies for my kids to take as a daily dose, with the plan to up the dosage with syrup at the first sign of sickness. So far we've had no need to go to syrup, and now the whole family is taking two each day. It's convenient and no more complaining from the (healthy) kids :)
customer_reviews.author: Celeste Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Sugar-free tasty Elderberry Gummies
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like the flavor of Elderberry syrup, but I recognize the value in it. Therefore, I looked for an alternative without sugar and found these. I find the flavor very good. So now, I can have my elderberries and eat them, too.
customer_reviews.author: kbird

customer_reviews.title: Cute little bears
customer_reviews.text: Just got home then in the mail today so I can’t be sure how well they will work.. but my daughter took it no problem... them being shaped like little bears really helped with that. Also they were a little hard but she didn’t mind the taste... sometimes elderberry vitamins don’t taste that good to her and are a little bitter but not these ones
customer_reviews.author: BusyBeeMommie

customer_reviews.title: Made in the U.S.A.
customer_reviews.text: I had heard that the Black Elderberry would boost my immunity. So I did my research. One criteria for me is to buy a product that is made in the U.S.A. There were very few. I love the taste and much easier than pills or liquid. Will have to see if it helps keep me and my husband healthy. Thank you for producing a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Shepherdess

customer_reviews.title: Best value!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the fact that each bottle comes with 60 gummies, like other bottles, but each of these dummies has 100mg of Elderberry. This is a great value. And they have an amazing taste. I bought these for my 3 kids to take during flu season. They all love them.
customer_reviews.author: R. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and taste for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and taste. The whole family uses them (kids 5 & 8) and my husband and I. They seem to be working because we have been around a lot of sickness and we have been able to fight most of it without antibiotics (except strep throat of course) and our illnesses seem shorter.
customer_reviews.author: Gigila

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: I got these for the kids...hoping to stay healthier this year. The kids love the taste and ask for their gummies daily.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Jo Thrasher

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t beat the price, I usually make my own syrup but my 2 year old doesn’t like the stein flavor. The gummies are a great way to get her to take it. She’s had a cold the past few days so I ordered these, they arrived this morning and she already seems a little better. Elderberry works wonders!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: These are so good, it’s hard not to eat too many!! Elderberry is a fantastic precaution against the flu. Works WAYYY better than a flu shot, and is much safer. This is my favorite brand.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Great gummies!
customer_reviews.text: My kids absolutely love these gummies! I've tried with syrups and other gummies but they didnt like the flavor or texture. I will definitely be getting these again.
customer_reviews.author: Melodye Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Flavor, quality and two pack make for great value. Price has gone up quite a bit however.
customer_reviews.text: Favorite brand. Bonus that it comes as a two pack.
customer_reviews.author: SLS

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and my kids love them!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several products. This is a good quality product with a great taste - my kids definitely don't mind them where I couldn't get them to take other brands I have tried. We use elderberry every year when the weather gets cooler and the kids go back to school to hopefully help ward off any cold/flu and generally boost immune system and so far so good. We haven't had any major health issues this year and hope that continues. I'm all for all-natural products whenever we can so I think doing this definitely doesn't hurt anything.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Hale

customer_reviews.title: Taste great
customer_reviews.text: I had elderberry gummies before and they did not taste good. I was pleasantly surprised these taste really good. I recently found out that I have COPD and I need as much help boosting my immune system as I can get. I live in Florida so I thought they may arrive all stuck together, but nope they were perfect. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Pink

customer_reviews.title: Not correct ingredients on label that claim to be in the product
customer_reviews.text: I reordered and as you can see the new bottle is bigger, no big deal...however when placing my reorder it still states that the products contain zero surgar and bee propolis, as you can see in the smaller bottle that is correct, the new bottle has 2g of surgar and no where on the labeling does it say anywhere that it contains any bee propolis. One of the main reasons I purchased this product was because of the benefits of the bee propolis and it is not an ingredient in the new product. I will be returning the product and hopefully get new one with what they claim to contain!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: All over the product description is bee propolis. This product does NOT contain any. I made the mistake of wasting my money on this product ....false advertising .....don’t make the mistake I did. If you are wanting bee propolis do not buy this product☹️
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Not organic, website does not exist
customer_reviews.text: This product is advertised as organic but there is no organic designation on the label. I attempted to check out the website on the label, but it doesn’t exist. Overall, they have a great taste but I’m uncomfortable giving these to my family.
customer_reviews.author: Angela H.

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as vegan/plant based, it is not. Organic, it is not. Including Bee propolis, it does not. Made by MixRX ? Bottle says Dakota nutrition. No website and unable to find info for that company. Very Misleading
customer_reviews.author: Christopher R Eiferd

customer_reviews.title: Helped me fight covid-19
customer_reviews.text: I am a Emergency dept nurse who contracted the corona virus , For 10 days I was extremely ill. I ordered these vitamins at the beginning of my illness in hopes to boost my immune system . After I started taken them I began to feel much better and I finally got over the virus and was able to return to work . I am so glad I brought this product and I will continue to recommend them to patients ! and they taste awesome.
customer_reviews.author: nursequa

customer_reviews.title: The price has doubled since October
customer_reviews.text: These gummies taste really good and I like them. However, I went to place an order and the price has doubled. Shame on you for taking advantage of people during these difficult times.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Senter

customer_reviews.title: Very sour and contains Xylitol.
customer_reviews.text: These are very sour. I was excited to find some elderberry gummies without the sugar coating because my eldest dislikes those, but now my youngest won’t take these because they are so sour. I also dislike that they are made with xylitol - I didn’t notice that in the ad. Xylitol is very toxic to dogs and should be noted for pet owners. I’d also rather have natural sugar used than an artificial sweetener.
customer_reviews.author: Dottidal

customer_reviews.title: This product is not vegan.
customer_reviews.text: This product is not vegan. Although this product is labeled as vegan it has gelatin in the ingredients. Deep.in the reviews it says they were going to correct it but they still haven't.
customer_reviews.author: Linda D

customer_reviews.title: Not properly sealed
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. Outside seal very loose and inside seal came off with the lid! Film inside the containers.
customer_reviews.author: K.Summers

customer_reviews.title: They were fantastic the first time. Not the same.
customer_reviews.text: Had I known they were going to change the formula I wouldn't have ordered them again. They are a weird sticky waxy texture now and the flavor isn't as tasty as it was before. I wish I still had the old bottle to compare ingredients. The shape doesn't really matter but they were originally shaped like bears now it's a berry shape. Shipping took forever this time too. I ordered June 20th and didn't get them til July 11th. I will be searching for a new brand.
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: A little Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Looks like they been sitting on a shelf for years, One of the air seals was already off. The other one was fine though. Idk if they are even ok at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony nash

customer_reviews.title: It’s NOT for kids/toddlers! False description of the product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product ONLY it said in the description for kids/toddlers. I received the items and there is NO single word about dosage for kids/toddlers. I emailed to vendor, the answer was: The gummies are indeed safe for toddlers, we just advise you to keep them out of reach of children to avoid overconsumption. We still recommend a serving of 1-2 gummies/day for toddlers. We have a three-year-old daughter daughter and we serve them to her on a daily basis”. People, do you really think I am going to feed my child upon your email instruction!? I have all screenshots, but this pro-forma does not allow me to add images. I do NOT recommend! Amazon watch what you sell.
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: All of the kids and adults in our house love the flavor! We've been taking these along with multivitamins to help with this crazy winter season.
customer_reviews.author: Zac

customer_reviews.title: False advertising, cheaper new reformulation
customer_reviews.text: Changed formulation. Cut elderberry potency. Buyer beware. I bought for the combo of bee propolis, echinacea and eldeberry. Well the new formulation no longer has the first 2 and elderberry is 150mg in 2 gummies whereas old was 1 gummy @ 100mg. Not buying again. False advertisement.
customer_reviews.author: Average Joe

customer_reviews.title: Fake products!
customer_reviews.text: Buyers beware! Fake and counterfeit products! Do not buy! I bought it and both bottles have loose inner paper sealed lid paper cover. Definitely someone poured these vitamins in these bottles and tried to seal the inner paper cover lid with glue!!!! Must be sent from China and sold by China. Stay away!!!! Buyers beware!!! You eat at your own risk. I demanded a refund and free return shipping label. Ridiculous!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chung Chen

customer_reviews.title: Interesting.
customer_reviews.text: - The label doesn’t say anything about organic. -Tastes like grape. -I got these for my toddler but they’re pretty hard to chew even for an adult so I end up giving her a 1/4 piece. Conclusion: they’re fine for now but I probably wouldn’t buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: annette828

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: Not happy about the malitol syrup. Stevia is the safest sweetener. I would like the product better if it was sweetened with natural fruit juice or stevia. Overall I guess it's an ok product. They make it look better than what is actually is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Changed the formula, same price half the dosage!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m really disappointed that the formula has changed. I loved that my kids only needed to take 1, now they need to take 2. So I’m paying the same amount but getting half the dosage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mysterious
customer_reviews.text: Like another reviewer I just snap purchased these without any research, only to find out afterwards that information on this company is slim and none. It has a Made in the USA with Pride emblem on the bottle, but that means little these days. It could mean the product was manufactured overseas and only bottled here. Who knows? I won't be back. Going to take my time and check things out thoroughly from now on.
customer_reviews.author: SusieQ

customer_reviews.title: Tasty
customer_reviews.text: These gummies are so yummy my kids beg for them. They are helpful in getting over a cold in just a day or two instead of struggling with sickness for a week. The shorten the length of a cold and also help to prevent getting sick. When sick, I double the dose. If someone in the house gets sick, I give out the recommended dosage and it usually helps them not to catch anyone else's cold.
customer_reviews.author: HAS

customer_reviews.title: Melted gross sweaty gummies not worth purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Received bottles over 2 weeks later and they are hot the gummies are all squeeshed and melted stuck together. It looks really gross i do not feel safe eating them. Now I need to go to post office pay for a bag and return them and get exposed to this virus when I live with my elderly parents. I am very disappointed with this purchase and regret getting them. You can see the heat in the bottle looks like the gummies are sweating. I put 1 star because I couldn’t put 0 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but I'd buy another brand
customer_reviews.text: The gummies themselves don't taste too bad. My kids who eat gummy vitamins don't care for the taste of them and won't take them. My biggest issue, is that I didn't actually get was was listed. The specifically answer a question stating there is bee pollen, and the pictures show ingredients with that and echinacea, but was I received didn't have that. Its just elderberry, zinc and C. I asked the seller and they said it only contains what the label says. Disappointing that we were misled with the product listing. We ate too many before I realized it to return them. I would buy a brand that contains those ingredients and is honest in the listing
customer_reviews.author: James S

customer_reviews.title: These work
customer_reviews.text: Everyone in the family takes them and first time ever with 3 children in school no one has come home sick after 6 months being back in class.had delivery problems company responded with a refund even though the package was on its way will definitely continue to buy from them.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Ziegler

customer_reviews.title: So far they work... only complaint is...
customer_reviews.text: So far they are working! They taste good too. My only complaints is that it says they are for adults, kids and toddlers, but doesn’t give the recommended dosage for the little ones! So I stayed on the safe side and gave them one. My other complaint is that there is no child proof cap. I put mine on top of my microwave, but my toddler managed to pull up a chair, climb up the counter and thank goodness caught her before she ate a handful of them. They do taste like fruit snacks. It was my mistake for not leaving them some place high enough, but they should consider putting on a child proof cap.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Caused stomach issues
customer_reviews.text: This product wreaked havoc on my digestive system. For days, I was taking it in the morning and everyday around 2pm my stomach would be extremely painful! I couldn’t even make a bowel movement to make the pain go away!! Once I realized this was the only new thing I was eating/ taking, I stopped taking them and I haven’t had those pains since.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda G.

customer_reviews.title: Changing to another brand after 4th purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this product four times. I was extremely happy before this time. They changed the product without notice. They changed the shape which is not so important but the taste is also different. I paid so much more this time than the first three times and now you have to take two gummies a day we're in the past it was one gummy a day! So almost double the money for half the product. Going with a different brand from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking 1-2 a day for a few months as a preventative measure and as a supplement - and they taste great!
customer_reviews.author: Ken W.

customer_reviews.title: Excited fight cold/flu with these gummies!
customer_reviews.text: We have recently started taking elderberry to build our immunity! We were taking an extract elderberry and was happy with it but it was sooo expensive ($24 for a supply that would only last a month for 1 person) so for my husband and baby, I would have had to buy 3 bottles a month! Ouch! So I was so excited to find these gummies for the amazing price! Let’s fight these viruses one gummy at a time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these gummies! They have a great taste that my entire family loves and they actually work. I felt a slight cold coming on so I decided to order them and try them. The symptoms were gone within a few days...seriously. Even my skeptical husband said he was feeling better after taking them. Will continue to order!
customer_reviews.author: Ms B

customer_reviews.title: My Family Love These Gummies!
customer_reviews.text: Great taste and my family love these gummies! I first ordered the gummies to boost our immune systems due to Covid-19. We have gone through 4 bottles and I’m ordering more today. Thankfully we haven’t even had a cold this spring and summer.
customer_reviews.author: KCHAFFINS

customer_reviews.title: Give half a gummy to kids - great price for amount
customer_reviews.text: It has about double the elderberry that’s some others do, so i use it for the whole family. I noticed the toddler to kids dose is 50-100mg depending on a child’s weight, so for one of the bottle I slice the gummies in half and only give 1/2 gummy to each kid. I leave the other bottle’s gummies whole and that one is the adult dose. For the price it lasts the longest. I’ve tried a kid’s brand but then you don’t get as many gummies for the price and adults have to take a double dose. This is the best amount for the $ and lasts the longest that I’ve found!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Price jump
customer_reviews.text: They were great but when I went to reorder them the price jumped way up so I went with something different.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: New formula-different taste
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this item multiple times but they changed something recently. The ones I got preciously were bear shaped and delicious. These look like berries and do not taste as good. Still fine but different and now I'll be looking for a better alternative.
customer_reviews.author: C.A.K.

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: I have an autoimmune disease and I'm always looking for a good immune boosting vitamin. I've taken elderberry before, but they weren't as good as these! These are so delicious it's hard to take only what you're supposed to because you want to eat the whole jar!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and a must have for a strong immune system!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot stand taking supplements in pill form. When I found these gummies I was optimistic! I was worried about the taste and texture, but these are delicious! They are a bit tart, but I like that and the texture is very soft, very easy to chew. My husband, who usually does not like them, is hooked! So much so that I’ve already ordered more since he absconded with my second bottle! So convenient and the ingredients are a MUST for immune support, especially during these days of COVID. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: Christa ;o)

customer_reviews.title: Great vitamins!
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed by the quality of this product and the efficacy: just recently my husband came down with a bad flu and had high fever and all the other nasty symptoms and I just got something that was just similar to a little cold that went away relatively quickly compared to him! I cannot be 100% sure that it was because of these supplements, but I think they surely helped a lot. Also, they taste amazingly and are very easy to take/eat! I definitely recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Manu

customer_reviews.title: Wish you hadn’t changed the flavor!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVED these elderberry gummies UNTIL they changed the flavor! While it is still a palatable flavor, it’s not nearly as enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: LLD

customer_reviews.title: These work!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a teacher, so I’m usually battling a cold at least 4 times a year but since I’ve started using these I’ve not gotten sick even one time. They taste great too. Unlike some other elderberry gummies I’ve tried, a serving size is just 2 gummies once a day. I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great for family!
customer_reviews.text: My whole family loves them! I like that they don't have a sugary coating on the outside because both of my boys refuse to eat those. We've definitely ordered them more than once!
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Great on first 2 orders, but not 3rd order!
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this item 3 times. The first 2 times they did come in different bottles but still tasted the same, which was great. We loved the taste of them! But, this 3rd order has really been disappointing! These were a berry shape...which isn't nessasarily bad...but The taste is so off as well as a different texture...not even close to as good! So, disappointed! I will be returning this batch.
customer_reviews.author: A. Willard

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic flavor/texture!
customer_reviews.text: Love these gummies! Reordering now! Elderberry has been shown to block flu viruses from attaching to cells, so we are ALL about these gummies during flu season especially. They are not too sweet, but sweet enough to be desired by my kiddos. They’re a little tangy, which I love. My kids get them as a prize for putting their shoes and jackets on for school :P these are definitely a household staple. Love em!
customer_reviews.author: becky crosswhite

customer_reviews.title: Delicious & Sugar Free
customer_reviews.text: These Elderberry gummies taste better to me then the sugar variety. Plus they taste quite fruity, moreso then others I've tried. I do like them very much!
customer_reviews.author: R.Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Strange taste and smell
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure if there was a problem in the factory or what, but I’ve never tasted elderberry like that. Kind of like burned plastic This was sent as a replacement because they were out of the brand I had ordered previously. I’m curious if they always taste like this
customer_reviews.author: Kristinbodistin

customer_reviews.title: No Flu this winter!
customer_reviews.text: My husband & I started taking this in Sept. to prepare for the colds and flu of winter. So far, no flu or colds!
customer_reviews.author: Amy K. Yates

customer_reviews.title: Great gummies for kids
customer_reviews.text: Very good taste and easier for my kids to take. They have a hard time with the Elderberry syrup, but love these gummies. They aren’t full of sugar either, there is a little bit, but not as much as others. Great product for trying to stay healthy during the cough and cold season.
customer_reviews.author: K. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Our Favorite Elderberry Supplement
customer_reviews.text: Originally I purchased this product because of the great price compared to some of the others we have tried. Was please to find out that my family prefers the taste of this gummy and it is not slippery or sticky like some. Also, the fact that is is extra strength is a plus. Since taking these supplements we have been able to stay well.
customer_reviews.author: lesli

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I and my husband take these before and if we wait to long during sickness. We love them. Kicks the immune system in the butt and we feel much better
customer_reviews.author: Janell knowles

customer_reviews.title: Great value, not great product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because of the value. I was interested in taking Elderberry to help my immune system get prepared for the cold and flu season. I wouldn't recommend this product. The ones I received were very hard and not easy to chew. Maybe they were stale but still, not great. I had to warm them up (just held them in my closed hands for a few minutes) in order to even bite down on them. They're not vegan or organic so please do your research. I will not be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Christian & Lena Dunham

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth It
customer_reviews.text: These are very chewy and the flavor isn’t my favorite. I was getting the Sambucus brand and I like the flavor more. I probably won’t buy again... I’d rather have Sambucus brand. I do like that it does have other ingredients (herbs) in them besides elderberry.... the taste is just gross.
customer_reviews.author: Kaisha

customer_reviews.title: The composition has changed - tastes like wax
customer_reviews.text: The new package that I got in July '20 has Echinacea removed (If you look at the Amazon url for this product it still lists Echinacea!!). The composition of Elderberry has also been reduced and it does not taste good. Its like eating flavored wax. Please bring back the old composition which had Echinacea, will have to look elsewhere for elderberry gummies. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and elderberry rich!
customer_reviews.text: We love the taste of these gummies. Additionally, most of the elderberry gummies you can buy are very expensive for such a small amount of elderberry in them. The last ones we bought made it necessary for an adult to eat 4 in one day...this one gets the same amount packed in only one gummy. Did I mention they are also delicious with natural ingredients! Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Pstell

customer_reviews.title: (2 Pack | 120 Gummies) Organic Elderberry Gummies
customer_reviews.text: Great Elderberry Gummies, love the flavor. The ingredients or the best I have found.
customer_reviews.author: Paula J. Klinger

customer_reviews.title: Best Gummies Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Our 8 year old daughter won't take any other elderberry gummies! We have tried 4 other brands when unable to find these and it was always a constant struggle to get her to take them. I couldn't blame her as all others have an awful aftertaste. Not these!! These gummies are incredible and the ENTIRE family loves them. Great taste with amazing immune support in these unique times. Has kept our daighter, my working husband and myself with MS healthy so far🤗 Thank you!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey B

customer_reviews.title: Taste amazing
customer_reviews.text: These taste so good. I have to remind my husband they are a supplement and we should follow the recommended use
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Wong

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and Powerful Combination on Immune Boosting Supplements!
customer_reviews.text: As a nurse, I was looking for one supplement that was low in sugar, was easy to swallow and was packed with the best immune boosting vitamins/properties WITHOUT the additives. This was by far the best option for me! I enjoy eating these gummies daily- they are full of awesome vitamins while tasting great. It's a win-win! I also love that I got two bottles, I was skeptical that they'd be worth it. But it was a pleasant surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a PA-C at an Urgent care clinic. My daughter recommended I try Elderberry for boosting the Immune system. I am all for keeping healthy especially during this tragic Covid19 outbreak. The bottle I’d attractive and label easy to read. The gummies are very flavorful and I am much more likely to be compliant with a chewable vs a tablet. I only started taking them a few days ago so unable to share effectiveness.
customer_reviews.author: Nanapatty

customer_reviews.title: Definitely buy
customer_reviews.text: Great product and has more elderberry than other brands and they taste a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: Keina M

customer_reviews.title: A win win for moms and kid :)
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my son and he is beyond picky when it comes to supplements ( he is 7) he loves them and takes them without me having to get after him or beg or yell lol.. the best thing is his immune system really seems like it is strengthened. He used to get at least one cold in the winter that would last a week or more and he seems to get just the sniffles now, nothing major! I like that there's no bad stuff in there, a win win for us both!!
customer_reviews.author: JYS78

customer_reviews.title: This product gave my immune system the boost it needed to help me feel better, quickly!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE the flavor! I took 2 gummies this morning and already feel better! It gave my immune system the boost it needed to help me feel better! I will buy these again once they are gone!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff J Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for the money. Good taste. Fresh. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you get both bottles
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two orders, one for me and one for my mother. Mine came and was as it should be, two bottles. Tasted great and good value for your money. My mom only received on bottle in her order. They ripped us off and she didn’t tell me until today.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flavor tastes like plastic :/
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying elderberry gummies for about a year now. The flavor of these taste like plastic, I'm very disappointed. The picture shows a clear bottle, mine came in a white, non-transparent bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Chrystine

customer_reviews.title: Ick
customer_reviews.text: They have suddenly changed the formulation of these gummies and it is no longer the same product. I haven't compared the nutritional information yet, but as far as the flavor goes, it is awful compared to the previous one. Probably won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: mpetriw

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting gummies. Plus it does not stick together!
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting edlerberry gummies! My kids love these. No problem giving it to them. I like that it is not sticky (unlike some other brands I've tried) and it also include 10mg of zinc with it. Perfect solution to boosting our immune system. I would highly recommend this product and will be buying them again.
customer_reviews.author: VeeYaa

customer_reviews.title: Immunity
customer_reviews.text: Tasted adult. Not colorful or too sweet. May be odd to say, but kind of like good wine and just as good for non-drinkers. Yes, this is a health supplement but did not feel like.had thrown packet of sugar in my mouth. Supplement balance good. We all need to help our immune system. Especially now.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Taste better than other brands! I just started taking these, others I was not consistent due to flavor. I believe I will take these daily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite elderberry gummies!
customer_reviews.text: Love that these gummies incorporate not just elderberry but zinc, vitamin c, and echinacea. All of my kids from 24 years old down to 8 years old like these better than another brand or flavor we have ever tried. They say that they are more tender and better texture and flavor than other brands. We will be buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Shanda Dornburg

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I love the flavor and the texture. This is my second order but I am disappointed that the seller doesn't honor it's advertising. It says to text a name and number to them to get your next 2 bottles free! I have done this several times to no response. Guess I will be ordering from someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Nana2011

customer_reviews.title: Changed formula - makes my stomach sick and has a weirdo taste/aftertaste
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these gummies back in March or so and loved them. I think the "old" formula had 100mg elderberry per gummy, and these have 75mg. These also make my stomach feel sick and I never had the issue before. I'm super bummed they changed it. We will be ordering something else next time.
customer_reviews.author: SavedbyGrace

customer_reviews.title: Taste great but hard texture
customer_reviews.text: These gummies tasted great but they were a bit hard. My son didn’t want to eat them for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Beissel

customer_reviews.title: Amazing gummies!
customer_reviews.text: The gummies are very tasty and easy to chew. I start my morning off with them. I’ve seen the health benefits of them in not getting sick.
customer_reviews.author: Waterweasel4

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend/Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: These Elderberry gummies are yummy and contain 100mg Black Elderberry. In addition they have vitamin C, echinacea, zinc and bee propolis. Black Elderberry is used for immune support and is an anti-viral. Be sure to keep them away from children--they are really cute and tasty little purple bears--but contain a medicinal herb. This company is not just trying to make a buck--this is very high quality stuff--even using organic tapioca flour for gelling property. Also, made in USA.
customer_reviews.author: vadoma

customer_reviews.title: Something changed...for the worse
customer_reviews.text: My first order of this was delicious. This order had new packaging, and the smell and flavor are very chemical-tasting. They are now disgusting!
customer_reviews.author: koala

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Over all, this isn’t that great. I have bought other brands and this one isn’t as strong. It’s a value for tour money but in reality it sucks. I was using another brand and decided to try this brand since I was spending more on the other with less gummies .. turns out my kids allergies came back almost immediately after the switch. Don’t buy it. It’s not worth it
customer_reviews.author: Alison

product_meta.title: Elderberry Gummies with Zinc, Vitamin C for Adults, Kids for Immune Support Booster Supplement - Sambucus Black Elderberry Extract - Top Alternative to Capsules, Syrup, Pills, Tea (2 Pack)
feature_bullets: (120 Gummies | 2 Month Supply) : Made with 150mg of Natural Sambucus Black Elderberry, Zinc, Vitamin C

3-IN-1 PREMIUM SUPPORT - Dakota's ELDERBERRY GUMMIES pack a potent formula that combines the health benefits of Vitamin C, Zinc, and Black Elderberry Extract; This potent combination delivers a sambucus elderberry gummy that provides the body an antioxidant that helps the immune system and your overall health

DELICIOUS, HEALTHY, AND LOW SUGAR - Our sambucus elderberry gummies are made from infused syrup natural black elderberry extract. These elderberries are a small, tart, healthy, and delicious alternative to regular gummy bear candy or Elderberry Capsules. Your kids won't know the difference and it will be a surprise treat for adults. These elderberry multivitamin gummies contain NO high fructose corn syrup, No preservatives, and are low sugar gummy vitamins

SEASONAL ALLERGY - This isn't your mom's Elderberry Syrup or Cold & Cough Medicine. This is an all year round gummy vitamin supplement booster that only requires one chewable gummy per day instead of 6 or more pills, capsules, tablets, or several tablespoons of syrup. Combined with Zinc and Vitamin C supplements which are included for their essential role in maintaining our health and aiding our body's natural defenses.

TRANSPARENCY AND TESTING - We set the bar higher at Dakota. We know transparency is important to you and it should be! Before that bottle arrives to your location, it goes through stringent third party testing that includes testing the raw materials and ensuring purity and potency. We also test for the exact concentration of ingredients to ensure absolute safety and effectiveness as well to make sure each bottle has what it says it has

A BRAND YOU CAN TRUST - All of Dakota's vitamin supplements including our Gluten Free Sambucus Elderberry Gummies are specially formulated with the highest quality all natural ingredients to help the immune and a healthy immune system. This premium formula is purity tested and free of GMOs, preservatives, and the most common allergens.
